      • addMovie

        @RequestMapping(path="/api/movie/",
                method=POST)
public tiy.com.Movies.Movie addMovie(@RequestBody
                                                                                                        tiy.com.Movies.Movie addingMovie)
        Accepts a JSON Movie object with title, runtime, year, genre set, returns JSON Movie object with auto-generated ID.
        Parameters:
        addingMovie - A movie object with values for title, runtime, year, and genre.
        Returns:
        returnedMovie with ID set
        See Also:
        Movie
